page.title: 09Kidderminster, Housing
page.content: Housing in the area is substantially local council built. Birchen Coppice Estate of 661 houses was opened on 1st May, 1946 and the Rifle Range Estate of 214 houses was completed in 1965. The 147 houses at Hoobrook were first occupied in 1966. There are two tower blocks of flats at Hoobrook. They were closed early in the new year of l970, amid much publicity, following allegations of structural deficiencies. They remained empty for a period in excess of five years. The whole episode is shrouded in secrecy.
